mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, FAC_SEQ_NO AS facSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS facGubunCode, FAC_CODE AS facCode, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE AS hireFacEnable, NOUSE_GUBUN AS nouseGubun, ASSET_SEQ_NO AS assetSeqNo FROM ATMS_02001170

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, FAC_SEQ_NO AS facSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS facGubunCode, FAC_CODE AS facCode, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE AS hireFacEnable, NOUSE_GUBUN AS nouseGubun, ASSET_SEQ_NO AS assetSeqNo FROM ATMS_02001170 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001170 SET FAC_SEQ_NO = #{facSeqNo}, CHANGE_CHASU = #{changeChasu}, STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, FAC_GUBUN_CODE = #{facGubunCode}, FAC_CODE = #{facCode}, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE = #{hireFacEnable}, NOUSE_GUBUN = #{nouseGubun}, ASSET_SEQ_NO = #{assetSeqNo} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001170 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, FAC_SEQ_NO, CHANGE_CHASU, STEXT_GUBUN, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, FAC_GUBUN_CODE, FAC_CODE, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE, NOUSE_GUBUN, ASSET_SEQ_NO ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{facSeqNo}, #{changeChasu}, #{stextGubun}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{facGubunCode}, #{facCode}, #{hireFacEnable}, #{nouseGubun}, #{assetSeqNo} )
